guide.introduction:
A fun way to express yourself through how you tie your shoes.

Please download the document LaceExpress_FinalInstructions.pdf for all step-by-step necessery how-to guides

Have fun! :)
guide.introduction_rendered:
A fun way to express yourself through how you tie your shoes.

Please download the document LaceExpress_FinalInstructions.pdf for all step-by-step necessery how-to guides

Have fun! :)

Relevant parts
  • Shoes or boots
Tools
  • Shoelace or bootlace, at least 36" long
